Fraud_incident_id.description: Create an id by concatenating sender_details and current date and time example "+00123456789_<ddmmyyyyhhmmss>

user_query.description: Set this from the user_query parameter

Fraud_Reason.description: Set this from reason to classify the text in the document as potential fraud

Fraud_Prob.description: Set this from probability or chances of text of the call transcript indicating a fraud

Fraud_Prob_Reason.description: Set this from the probability or chances of financial loss incurred due to the the text transcript of the fraud call

event_time.description: set as per current date and time in format day month year hour minute second <ddmmyyyyhhmmss>
